Text: This is incredibly cool - thank you 2040.

@ twentyforty: So at last I managed to register - mostly to assure you of my appreciation and to let you know how much I respect your work. I also enjoy reading the comments. Some of them amuse me quite a lot.

I am going to help out a little - meaning: literally a little - but for a few days

Thank You!
Thanks. And redvanilla, many people told me that they never know when I am kidding and when I'm bitching or preaching... well... it might be considered as my personal 'shades of gray'.

i didn't even dl this but i just wanted you to know how much i love you twentyforty

this much!
